tags: the league of gentlemen live again
summary: Former Doctors David Tennant and Peter Capaldi went to see Mark Gatiss live on stage
title: Former Doctors David Tennant and Peter Capaldi went to see Mark Gatiss live on stage
body:
Two Doctors and John Simm’s Master were all in the audience

Thursday, 27th September 2018 at 12:11 pm

It’s a wonder the universe hasn’t imploded yet.

After their recent reunion at a sci-fi convention in Austin, Texas, two former Time Lords David Tennant and Peter Capaldi both went to see Doctor Who writer Mark Gatiss live on stage on the same night.

  • The scripts for Doctor Who series 11 were originally written for a male Doctor
  • There’ll be no romance between Jodie Whittaker and her companions in the new Doctor Who series
  • Doctor Who to move from Saturdays to Sundays for new era

Gatiss and his co-stars were performing in League of Gentlemen Live at the Eventim Apollo in Hammersmith, London.

And Capaldi and Tennant weren’t the only Doctor Who alumni in the room…

John Simm, who played The Master and Doctor Who’s nemesis, also attended the show, as did comedian David Walliams, who played alien-mole Gibbis during the sixth series of Doctor Who.

Watching League of Gentleman Live, feel like I’m at the Baftas or a Doctor Who convention.

John Simms behind, David Tennant 5 down, David Walliams , 8 down and Peter Capaldi in front. I’m now hunting for Tom Baker

  • 28
  • See The Widower Daddy’s other Tweets

Twitter Ads info and privacy

Capaldi and Tennant also posed for pictures with theatre goers at the London venue.

View image on Twitter

Two Doctors (and somewhere, a Master) in the house at #LeagueOfGentlemenLiveAgain

  • 372
  • 90 people are talking about this

Twitter Ads info and privacy

View image on Twitter

“David! This is Chris. He likes #DoctorWho, but apparently I’m not enough…” #NotTrue #GottaCatchEmAll #OnlyNeedEcclestonNow

  • 612
  • 117 people are talking about this

Twitter Ads info and privacy

Did anyone snag a picture with all four?

Tags

  • David Tennant
  • David Walliams
  • John Simm
  • Peter Capaldi
  • Doctor Who

tags: the man of a thousands faces
summary: David’s Face; a Comparison
title: David’s Face; a Comparison
body:
Here is a comparison of David Tennant’s lovely face when being involved with a marriage proposal while at Comic Cons.

David’s basic expression for fan photos

Salt Lake City FanX proposal #1  (X)

Edmonton Wizard World proposal #2  (X)

Edmonton Wizard World proposal #3  (X)

David with a photobombing John Barrowman  (X)

Look at his precious wee face. Proposals and John Barrowman make him so happy!!!  Does anyone else think David & John are the younger Scottish equivalent to Ian McKellan & Patrick Stewart?  I love them all.
